SEARCH
Package org.jarzarr.input

Class KeyTrigger

java.lang.Object
org.jarzarr.input.KeyTrigger
All Implemented Interfaces:
Trigger
public final class KeyTrigger extends Object implements Trigger
Keyboard-based trigger.

Wraps a single KeyEvent keycode and exposes the Trigger interface so it can be bound to a high-level action in ActionMap.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    KeyTrigger(int keyCode)
    Creates a trigger for a specific keyboard key.

    Method
    Description

    Returns true while the trigger is currently held/active.

    Returns true only on the tick the trigger transitions from inactive -> active.

    Returns true only on the tick the trigger transitions from active -> inactive.
